clinical_study.brief_title: Meditation-Based Stress Reduction in Rheumatoid Arthritis
clinical_study.official_title: Mindfulness Meditation-Based Stress Reduction in Relieving Symptoms Associated With Rheumatoid Arthritis

lead_sponsor.agency: National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health (NCCIH)

clinical_study.source: National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health (NCCIH)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a mindfulness meditation-based stress reduction program is useful in relieving symptoms associated with rheumatoid arthritis (RA).

facility.name: University of Maryland School of Medicine - Kernan Hospital
